title: Ep. 31 :: A Mix of Oil and Gold
itunes:title: A Mix of Oil and Gold
description: Matt Badiali, editor of the S&A Resource Report , talks BP and natural gas. John Doody, editor of the Gold Stock Analyst newsletter, breaks down current gold trends and gives us his top picks in the industry.
